reviewText: Again, quit with the 20 words, I love Egypt and the ancient lives, I've been there, I have an extensive DVD collection, this is just one more, its fine OK
This DVD is worthless.  It gives me an "incorrect disc" message when I load it into any of my DVD players.  Total waste of money.  Do not buy!!!

Disk does not play--in fact was not recognized--on any of the 3 players I tried, which included a Blu-ray and a region-free player. My guess is that the DVD-R was actually never recorded by the manufacturer. I strongly suggest you do not purchase, at least not from this provider.
